thread.title: MENIFEE: Murrieta man fatally shot in McDonalds ID'd (UPDATE)
thread.title_full: MENIFEE: Murrieta man fatally shot in McDonalds ID'd (UPDATE) - Press Enterprise

author: ALI TADAYON and PETER SUROWSKI
title: MENIFEE: Murrieta man fatally shot in McDonalds ID'd (UPDATE)
text:
By ALI TADAYON and PETER SUROWSKI / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 10, 2015 Updated: 8:24 p.m. MENIFEE: Murrieta man fatally shot in McDonalds ID'd (UPDATE) Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Amanda Harwood, 35 Related article Â» A Big Bear woman was arrested Friday, Oct. 9, on suspicion of shooting a Murrieta man to death in a McDonald's in Menifee.
Amanda Harwood, 35, was booked into jail after the incident, which occurred about 6 p.m. at the restaurant in the 28000 block of Bradley Drive, according to a Riverside County Sheriff's Department news release. Her bond is set at $1 million
When deputies arrived to the scene after receiving reports of the shooting, they found the man dead inside of the restaurant. Harwood was immediately located and arrested, the news release said.
The man was later identified as Joseph Hennings, 39, of Murrieta, the Riverside County Coroner's Office announced.
The shooting remained under investigation Saturday. Sheriff's officials ask that anyone with information about the incident call the Central Homicide Unit at 951-955-2777 or the Menifee station at 951-210-1000.
